Reviews.Title: WiFI enabled...Marvellous
Reviews.Author: Theoni Lussos "Kandy"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my sister for her birthday because it had Built-in Wi-Fi capability, and you can send photos to Facebook(tm), Picasa(tm), Photobucket(tm) or email directly from the camera. You can also upload videos to YouTube You can also save the images to your PC by just one click with Auto Backup. No searching for the cable, and while it is a  long (10x) zoom camera it is not bulky but fits in her pocket (it's about 19mm thick)...and for traveling, which she will be doing this summer, it has  Live Panorama, that creates 180º panoramic images. Finally since she isn't the best at manuevering all the dials, this baby has Smart Auto 2.0. that has scene detection technology identifying up to 16 different shooting conditions, instantly analyzing  key elements of the composition, and then  adjusting to optimize settings for every individual situation.  Other things are Magic Frame which has 12 background templates such as Wall Art, Full Moon, Magazine and Holiday that let you easily create poster-quality art and Artistic Brush which is like your own in camera pixlr that  takes any portrait, landscape or candid and turn it into a black and white sketch and Split Shot where  you can merge up to three different images to create an artistic statement!I personally liked the Optical Image Stabilization(OIS) that helps you get still shots whether you are or not (moving cars, shaky hands, ferris wheels) .  It comes in black, silver and hot pink....she loves it and I liked the fab price.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Simple and good...
Reviews.Author: Northspirit
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera.  Great pictures and the video is surprisingly good with 720p.  The menus only require a minimal learning curve.  The wi-fi is a great feature and transfers to my computer, tablet, and social sites are smooth and fast.  The price makes it a good value.

Reviews.Title: Amazing pictures and video for the price
Reviews.Author: akshatp
Reviews.Content: Originally saw this at Target on clearance for $150, but they didnt have any in stock.  Turns out it was even less on Amazon.  I was skeptical at first, but figured Ill give it a shot for my mother in law who had lost her camera on vacation.I can honestly say I am blown away by the quality of the pictures this thing produces.  Even in semi-low light conditions very little noise, great focus.  The 720p video on a bright day outside rivals that of my Canon Vixia camcorder.  Even video taken inside with the lights on is more than adequate as long as you dont plan on selling your footage to hollywood.Its easy enough to use for the technically challenged, and offers some more advanced features (wifi transfer, email, social networking stuff) if you are inclined to use it for that.For under $120, you cannot go wrong with this.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!!!!
Reviews.Author: Christine Chacon Brandlin
Reviews.Content: THIS IS ONEOF THE EASIEST CAMERAS TO USE. THE OPERATION IS IS COMMON SENSE. I DIDN'T REALLY READ ALL THE INSTRUCTIONS AND I SHOULD AND WILL SOME DAY, BUT ONCE I CHARGED THE BATTERY, I STARTED TAKING PICTURES, ZOOMING IN AN OUT AND TAKING PICTURES OF FLOWERS IN MY GARDEN. SUCH BEAUTIFUL PICTURES THEY ARE. I ALSO TOOK PICTURES AT FAMILY EVENTS AND IT TOOK GREAT PICTURES. THE TRANSFERRING OF PICTURES TO MY COMPUTER WAS A SNAP!. I RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA TO ANYONE THAT WANTS AN EASY TO OPEARTE CAMERA!

Reviews.Title: Excelent option!
Reviews.Author: Enrique Martinez
Reviews.Content: It's quiet a very good option for a first camera for kids, it would be great if had have a touchscreen

Reviews.Title: AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Helm "Steph"
Reviews.Content: I totally LOVE this camera, and the color.  Small and easy to use! Cannot find a better product then this.

Reviews.Title: Zoom got stuck within 2 months
Reviews.Author: Susanna Ryan
Reviews.Content: Had to send it in for repair...zoom got stuck.  They couldn't fix it, but offered a replacement...didn't want the model they were going to send as a replacement.  I did get a full refund.  Went with a different camera...worried it would happen again.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Lorne Russell
Reviews.Content: bought it for my girl as a gift.what great pictures and easy to learn how to use all the bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: I like my Camera
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Reese
Reviews.Content: It takes very nice photos.  The only drawback is not being able to see the screen in bright sun/glare conditions.  Is there a glare-reducing screen that could be applied?

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: RosiePosie
Reviews.Content: This camera was a huge improvement from one I bought over a decade ago, lol. I just love it, its easy to use & pictures come out fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Samsung ST200F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Plum (EC-ST200FBPLUS)
Reviews.Author: Neilsa Mercado "neilsa"
Reviews.Content: I love the zoom on this camera now I really haven't use yet but I took a few pictures to test it out and I Like the pictures I had a Nikon camera and broke within a year a brought it, Samsung is suppose to be one of the best. thank you

Reviews.Title: Great digital camera
Reviews.Author: Victoria Hugo
Reviews.Content: Great compact digital camera. Takes really good pictures and not difficult to figure out. I had to buy a memory card for it first thing though as it does not have much for internal memory. Love the color

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera, slow shutter speed.
Reviews.Author: LMD
Reviews.Content: I like this little camera very much, but the settings are cumbersome. Getting back to "normal" mode is difficult after playing around with different settings. The shutter speed is slow and pictures are often missed because the button seems to not depress and I have to start over.

Reviews.Title: Planned Ahead
Reviews.Author: nancy gruer
Reviews.Content: Here is a situation that I have tried before and this time "success".Digital cameras only last so long, so when my red camera started acting like it was about to stop working I actually began research on the "perfect camera for me".  SUCCESS, like I said, happened with lots of research and planning.I absolutely love love love this camera.  It is exactly what I want.  Once I made up my mind, ordering was easy, shipping was appropriate for an undamaged product arriving on time.  I use this beauty almost daily it is exactly what I want.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "dmo"
Reviews.Content: I wanted a smartphone but didn't want to pay a fortune for it. I am still learning the phone,wish a booklet came with it so could experment at lunch etc.I know I am going to love this camera.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Brittney Norman
Reviews.Content: I needed something for when my little girl arrives that wasn't going to cost me a fortune.We'll see how it does when baby arrives =)

ProductInfo.Features:
Wireless-enabled
10x Optical zoom
16 MP CCD sensor
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST200F Long Zoom Smart Camera - Plum (EC-ST200FBPLUS)
